id.description: Scottish-Canadian, 57 years old, salt & pepper beard.

aspects.aspect: It's Not the Years, It's the Mileage
Fought the Yanks in the Skies in 1812

stunts.stunt: You've read hundreds - if not thousands - of books on a wide variety of topics. You can spend a Fate Point to use Lore in place of any other skill for one roll or exchange, provided you can justify having read about the action you’re attempting. (Once per Scene).
When it comes to naval battles, you've seen every trick in the book. +2 when actively opposing Sail rolls to create positional aspects.

phase.events: Born in Hamilton, ON, 1793. Like any loyal colonial subject of the Queen, Gordon volunteered to defend his home from American invasion. He served aboard HMAS Dauntless, which primarily defended Canada from invasion in the skies above Lake Ontario. In its final battle, The Dauntless successfully held off the USAS Jefferson, which retreated back to Rochester. The Dauntless sank, but Gordon (obviously) survived.
